title: 'Broken stowage',

title: The works of Professor Wilson of the University of Edinburgh,
author: Wilson, John

title: Deilie Jock
author: Campbell, C. M.
snippet: As sure as death, it's the truth I'm tellin' ye. Iwas unloadin' a ship at Leith Docks, and a heavycase slippet aff the crane and plunked fair on mythigh." Here the model stroked the injured limbby way of clinical demonstration.

title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: " Hech, but she was the bonny lassie, Maister Airmitage. But what was the maitter wi' her ? She was greetin' whanshe got intil the caub, and she grot the hale road doon taeLeith Docks. I felt wae for her."

title: By Adverse Winds. [A novel.]
author: Smeaton, William Henry Oliphant.
snippet: "To Leith Docks? What did she want there?" askedRobert, in astonishment.
